"I would use this company again and I highly recommend their service." "But the owner has yet to return and finish a separate job as promised." "His prices are VERY REASONABLE and the quality of work is exemplary."

I have been asked and I’ve shared about my screened in patio to family and friends but I have to share in a review so everyone knows my experience with Solar Screens N More. I had 2 companies to come out with a quote and what they could and … More Response from the owner a month ago Thank you!! We really appreciate your review and business!!

I recently hired this company to build a closed-in extension on my home, and they delivered superb results. The entire project was completed in just two days, and the quality of their work exceeded my expectations. The crew was … More

Install complete in less than 3 weeks from final measurements.  Outstanding service and reasonable pricing. … More Response from the owner a year ago Thanks for the great feedback! We're glad to hear about the quick installation and that you found our service and pricing reasonable.
